summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1843, for the improvement of Seventh Avenue North, from Aloha Street to a point about four hundred (400) feet north or the north line of Garfield Street, in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with such gates, tees, crosses, hydrants and other appurtenances as may be necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 19035, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
